( phase II ) OUTLINE : This phase I , dose-escalation study sorafenib tosylate combination lenalidomide follow phase II study . Patients receive oral sorafenib tosylate twice daily day 1-28 , oral lenalidomide daily day 1-21 , oral dexamethasone day 1 , 8 , 15 , 22 . Treatment repeat every 28 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients undergo blood bone marrow sample collection periodically study laboratory correlative study .
